Class Graph.Node<T,E>

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.flub.data.Graph.Node<T,E>
Type Parameters:
T - value type
E - edge type
Enclosing class:
Graph<T,E>
public static final class Graph.Node<T,E> extends Object
An individual vertex with outbound and inbound edges in a Graph.

    • getOutbounds

      public Collection<Graph.Node<T,E>> getOutbounds()
      Returns:
      all nodes connected by an outbound edge from this node

    • getOutboundRelations

      public Collection<Graph.Node.RelatedNode<T,E>> getOutboundRelations()
      Returns:
      all nodes connected by an outbound edge from this node, along with connection metadata

    • getInbounds

      public Collection<Graph.Node<T,E>> getInbounds()
      Returns:
      all nodes connected by an inbound edge to this node

    • getInboundRelations

      public Collection<Graph.Node.RelatedNode<T,E>> getInboundRelations()
      Returns:
      all nodes connected by an inbound edge to this node, along with connection metadata

    • outDegree

      public int outDegree()
      Returns:
      number of outbound edges from this node

    • inDegree

      public int inDegree()
      Returns:
      number of inbound edges to this node

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Returns:
      whether this node has an outbound or inbound edge to at least 1 other node
